snippet.textDisplay: Sai Deepak and Sandeep jee you are doing great work. Having said that my humble suggestion would be to look at modernity which is a larger paradigm which incorporates or digests Islam, Christianity, communism, the liberals and seculars - all of them. If some of us start exposing modernity for what is is - completely illusionary and false and full of inherent contradictions -  that would go a long way in supporting the work you are doing. Also thisapproach may work with some of our secular liberal educated classes.

snippet.textDisplay: How are we going to survive as a Sanatana Hindu Civilization in independent Bharath? In 75 years, the present "Secularism, Secular State/ Constitution" has resulted in both Minority (Muslims) and Majaority (Hindus) feeling insecure!! There is no parallel any where in the world like this today. So we have to Change and bring in new system. There is a time tested model working very well, that is Dubai Model Or Gulf Model. What is it? 15-20% natives controlling 80-85% expatriates!! All are happy, live a peaceful life. Here, the only difference is the 15-20% and the 80-85% are all natives, that is , citizens. So, slight modification, de-franchise the 15-20% and declare Bharat as Sanatana Hindu Rashtra, and make laws according to Dharma, and not according to "Rights" concept, thus reviving our civilization and at the same time keep the doors open for our estranged blood-relations to return home (Ghar Wapsi). A new era will dawn.
snippet.textOriginal: How are we going to survive as a Sanatana Hindu Civilization in independent Bharath? In 75 years, the present "Secularism, Secular State/ Constitution" has resulted in both Minority (Muslims) and Majaority (Hindus) feeling insecure!! There is no parallel any where in the world like this today. So we have to Change and bring in new system. There is a time tested model working very well, that is Dubai Model Or Gulf Model. What is it? 15-20% natives controlling 80-85% expatriates!! All are happy, live a peaceful life. Here, the only difference is the 15-20% and the 80-85% are all natives, that is , citizens. So, slight modification, de-franchise the 15-20% and declare Bharat as Sanatana Hindu Rashtra, and make laws according to Dharma, and not according to "Rights" concept, thus reviving our civilization and at the same time keep the doors open for our estranged blood-relations to return home (Ghar Wapsi). A new era will dawn.

snippet.textDisplay:
Disagree that history can be de idealized . Samskaras are part of existence , because negation is essential to being , ontologically speaking . Please get over this I
Empiricist epistemology. Wrongly accusing Marxism, it’s western empiricist epistemology since Aristotle , Descartes , Ockham Kant, Hime along with European imperialist sociology is to blame. Why do you think that the west once hated Marxism is all praise for it now,wokism  is empericized  Marxism. Yes Marx had flaws but his dialectical examination is much closer to a better epistemology . Marx made the same error as  . The rest of western thinkers, namely denied due diligence to the paradigm study..this goes back to the rejection of Parmenides and Plato by the west in favor of Aristotle and Abraham . I agree that wokism is delusional especially the so-called Marxists are useful idiots,bottom line is that the attack is not correctly pointed at empiricism , liberal JS Mill that are epistemologically challenged . Indian communists are the prime example of useful idiots. Who is more dangerous , Marx one  ew York Times

snippet.textDisplay: Both Sai Deepak and Sandeep ji have contributed a lot in awakening hindu society. But I see a bit cotradiction when he says that he has lots of hope and at the same time says hindus fear of being back stabbed by their own leaders. How can one be hopeful in such a scary situation. Moreover, I do not agree with Sandeep ji that changing history books would not be effective. In my view, the only good thing about BJP has been that did not jail people like Sai and Sandeep ji. Otherwise, I see BJP as a carbon copy of Congress as their primary goal is to get and retain power! They have failed miserably in their constitutional duty to protect hindu lives and interests as citizens of India. Moreover, Congress's appeasement pales before Modi's. What good use the huge legislative power hindus vested them with was put to by BJP? In fact, today BJP has dismantled hindu support systems and organisations. RSS too has been reduced to an insignificant contributor to power and as a result they too have started singing Modi tunes. There is no free discussion on issues in BJP. It is time BJP was freed from stranglehold of Modi. We need to work at state levels to throw up hindu centric leadership. Key lies in stares as law and order is primarily state subject. Unfortunately, despite all awakening , hindus today remain goalless, leaderless and no organisation to take up hindu issues from village to international level. VHP is dead!
snippet.textOriginal: Both Sai Deepak and Sandeep ji have contributed a lot in awakening hindu society. But I see a bit cotradiction when he says that he has lots of hope and at the same time says hindus fear of being back stabbed by their own leaders. How can one be hopeful in such a scary situation. Moreover, I do not agree with Sandeep ji that changing history books would not be effective. In my view, the only good thing about BJP has been that did not jail people like Sai and Sandeep ji. Otherwise, I see BJP as a carbon copy of Congress as their primary goal is to get and retain power! They have failed miserably in their constitutional duty to protect hindu lives and interests as citizens of India. Moreover, Congress's appeasement pales before Modi's. What good use the huge legislative power hindus vested them with was put to by BJP? In fact, today BJP has dismantled hindu support systems and organisations. RSS too has been reduced to an insignificant contributor to power and as a result they too have started singing Modi tunes. There is no free discussion on issues in BJP. It is time BJP was freed from stranglehold of Modi. We need to work at state levels to throw up hindu centric leadership. Key lies in stares as law and order is primarily state subject. Unfortunately, despite all awakening , hindus today remain goalless, leaderless and no organisation to take up hindu issues from village to international level. VHP is dead!

snippet.textDisplay: Thousands are converting to Buddhism after a fiery anti Hindu pledge! Unless Hinduism removes the stain of casteism and untouchability totally, I mean totally, the future would be a Savarna group who prevail as Hindus! snippet.textDisplay:
One Mr.Sridhara has alluded to NEIs helping the cause of Hindu revival or better ‘Hindu backlash’ if I may say so. Like Sai and Sandeep mentioned, the anti-Hindu forces are now going all out and attacking from every nook and corner. Take Tamil Nadu, Punjab, Delhi or even Maharashtra- conversions are happening like never before and Hindus, Hinduism and Hindutva are under violent attack.
Yes, we can do with help from NRI in more than monetary terms - like George Seros is doing for Christianity. What about home-grown Industrialists with shiploads of money and organisational strength? How about the pontiffs and heads of Mutts, sadhus, Spiritual Gurus and such others coming together under one umbrella? Is there a visionary now who can take this up?
It seems the journey is hard.  But Hindus have weathered such storms before. 
So will they now🙏

snippet.textDisplay: I couldn't sleep last night for my disappointment with the West, after I learnt that Md Zubair was shortlisted for the Peace prize. Is it to pinch us for not aligning with the "west" against Russia, or are they really ignorant of how Islamic Jihad works. Sad thing is, majority of unbiased people in the West simply believe these awards and news articles, and think Hindus are really harming Indian muslims, though the reality is the absolute opposite from last 800 years, and even today!
